content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming, Mr. Li. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I'm a student, so I'm looking for a place that's both dependable and responsible with the budget. I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand, Mr. Li. As a landlord, I am also looking for a tenant who will take good care of the apartment and pay a fair price. How much do you think is a fair price for this 25-square-meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I believe that a fair price for this apartment would be around 800 Euro per month. This is based on the size and location of the apartment, as well as my budget as a student. I'm hoping we can agree on this price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euro per month is below my asking price. While I appreciate your budget as a student, I need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine
